mapper.select: select *from comQualification where scope like '%${EleAppliance}%' ORDER BY Rating DESC

DECLARE @geog2 GEOGRAPHY Select @geog2=geography::STGeomFromText('POINT (${longitude} ${latitude})', 4326) SELECT *, geography::Point([Lat], [Lon], 4326).STDistance(@geog2) / 1000 AS [distance] FROM comQualification where scope like '%${EleAppliance}%' order by distance asc

DECLARE @geog2 GEOGRAPHY Select @geog2=geography::STGeomFromText('POINT (114.368771 30.614510)', 4326) SELECT *, geography::Point([Lat], [Lon], 4326).STDistance(@geog2) / 1000 AS [distance], Rating-(geography::Point([Lat], [Lon], 4326).STDistance(@geog2) / 5000) as[syn] FROM comQualification where lat>0 and lon>0 and Rating>0 and scope like '%${EleAppliance}%' order by syn desc
